txt.en: Burned vile totems at Baur Kasak.
Vile totems can be found at Baur Kasak in Arandor.\n\nYou should burn vile totems at Baur Kasak.

You destroyed many of the vile totems dotting the hillside at the Warg dens of Baur Kasak, and it is to be hoped this will put an end to the unnatural ferocity the totems seemed to bequeath to the creatures.

The hungry inhabitants of Baur Kasak allow no intrusion into their domain. Vile totems stand here and there on the hillside, their presence seeming to empower the Wargs with an unnatural ferocity. You should destroy these totems.
Vile totems can be found at Baur Kasak in Arandor.\n\nYou should burn vile totems at Baur Kasak.
The Warg dens of Baur Kasak are a dangerous place to venture, but if the Great Alliance is to have victory they must be dared.
Burn vile totems at Baur Kasak
